channel.title: Posts on Vibrant Shadows Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Vibrant Shadows Theme

item.title: Getting started with Vibrant Shadows
item.description: It’s very easy to get started with Vibrant Shadows. How? Read on.

item.title: Hugo's built-in global configurations
item.description: Options that Hugo has built-in and are relevant to this theme. If something is not covered here (or elsewhere in this file), there’s a good chance it is covered in this Hugo docs page.

item.title: Custom configuration options in the theme
item.description: Here, we will mainly see settings that are unique to this theme. This page may not be updated with latest docs. Read this Readme file to know the latest updated configuration options.

item.title: Page configuration options in the theme
item.description: ‘Page paremeters’ relate to the particular content file in whose front-matter they are defined.

item.title: Example config.yaml
item.description: An example configuration file (config.yaml), which shows all the configuration options supported by ‘Vibrant Shadows’ theme by Softorage, with explaining comments.

item.title: Additional information about the theme
item.description: We share some additional information about this theme, that may be relevant.
